title: ACE COMBAT: AH
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  Fly at supersonic speeds and experience intense shooting gameplay with mass destruction! Engage the enemy in intense close range dogfights with a fighter plane! Wipe out enemy ground forces in one full sweep as you evade explosions in an attacker plane!   Use an attack helicopter, a bomber, and a gunship to destroy enemy forces with massive firepower!  Experience an exciting story set in the real-world in the single player campaign and participate in a variety of 2-16 player online game modes!   The story and events depicted in this work are fiction. Any resemblance to actual political states, geographic locations, persons, living or dead, corporations and organizations is purely coincidental. The work contains actual architectural structures, locations, governments and militaries, but is not affiliated with and does not endorse, nor is a benefactor of, any associated corporations, organizations, political states or persons.  All trademarks and trade names are the property of their respective owners.  All trademarks and copyrights associated with the manufacturers, aircraft, models, trade names, brands and visual images depicted in this game are the property of their respective owners, and used with such permissions.  ©GeoEye/JAPAN SPACE IMAGING CORPORATION ©DigitalGlobe,Inc.,All Rights Reserved.  ACE COMBAT ® ASSAULT HORIZON & ©2011 NAMCO BANDAI Games Inc.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: A-10A "Happy Holidays"
childDownloads.description: A-10A "Happy Holidays" is an aircraft skin with a Christmas theme. Hear the chimes of the 30 mm on Christmas Eve!  *This item can also be purchased in a pack. Please be careful not to purchase the same aircraft skins. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 5. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 5.

childDownloads.title: A-10A "Warthog"
childDownloads.description: A-10A "Warthog" is an aircraft skin based on a warthog.  *This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 4. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 4.

childDownloads.title: ACE COMBAT ASSAULT・HORIZON Trailer (2ch)
childDownloads.description: Steel Carnage! Sonic-Speed Destruction Shooting!! ACE COMBAT ASSAULT・HORIZON "East Africa", "Russia", "USA", the war is upon the real world! Choose from Supersonic Fighters, Attack Helicopters and Advanced Bombers, appropriate for the various missions! Chase aggressively at high-speed, track your enemy down and destruct your enemy into pieces!

childDownloads.title: ACE COMBAT ASSAULT HORIZON Demo
childDownloads.description: Take to the skies at supersonic speeds in the ACE COMBAT ASSAULT HORIZON playable demo. Containing two missions (fighter jet & attack helicopter), you will experience steel carnage destruction and intense visceral dogfights as well as the entirely new low-altitude action-packed ground combat.

childDownloads.title: AH-64D "Leopard Pattern"
childDownloads.description: AH-64D "Leopard Pattern" is an aircraft skin based on a leopard's spots. Take control of this helicopter and stalk your prey in the skies!  *This item can also be purchased in a pack. Please be careful not to purchase the same aircraft skins. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 5. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 5.

childDownloads.title: ASF-X Shinden II
childDownloads.description: The ASF-X Shinden II is an original multirole aircraft design created by Shoji Kawamori, a leading Japanese mechanical designer.  This is a fictional aircraft with a variable airframe which provides stable flight performance at any speed level. It is equipped with a variety of weapons for air-to-air and air-to-ground combat, allowing it to be used in all types of strategic operations. Boasting a variable, forward swept wing configuration, its outstanding maneuverability provides excellent close range combat abilities. It is a fictional support aircraft with a unique two-tiered engine which allows it to be a VTOL aircraft as well.  *This aircraft can be used in free missions that feature multirole aircraft and in competitive online. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 2. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 2.

childDownloads.title: BOOST AND TURN
childDownloads.description: Boost and Turn is a downloadable skill which increases both throttle and turning performance of your engine. Use this skill to evade and move quickly around the enemy!  *This skill can also be purchased in a set. Please be careful not to purchase the same skills. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 6. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 6.

childDownloads.title: Compatibility Pack 7
childDownloads.description: This additional data (free of charge) is required for online matchmaking. Once this data is downloaded, matchmaking with players who have downloaded items in Downloadable Content 1 through 7 is possible.  *You will still need a voucher code or purchase the items on the Xbox LIVE Marketplace to use them in the game.

childDownloads.title: Compatibility Pack 8
childDownloads.description: This additional data (free of charge) is required for online matchmaking. Once this data is downloaded, matchmaking with players who have downloaded items in Downloadable Content 1 through 8 is possible.  *You will still need a voucher code or purchase the items on the Xbox LIVE Marketplace to use them in the game.

childDownloads.title: DEFENDER
childDownloads.description: Defender is a downloadable skill which greatly increases durability and ECM range. Use this skill to penetrate the enemy's defenses!  *This skill can also be purchased in a set. Please be careful not to purchase the same skills. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 5. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 5.

childDownloads.title: ENHANCED ASM+
childDownloads.description: Enhanced ASM+ is a downloadable skill which increases the ease of initiating ASM, while making it more difficult to initiate DFM.  *This skill is also included in Skill Set 1. When purchasing a skill set, please check its contents. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 1. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 1.

childDownloads.title: ENHANCED BOMBS+
childDownloads.description: Enhanced Bombs+ is a downloadable skill which increases the destructive power of bombs while sacrificing the aircraft's durability. Use this skill to completely wipe out enemy ground forces!  *This skill can also be purchased in a set. Please be careful not to purchase the same skills. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 6. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 6.

childDownloads.title: ENHANCED DFM+
childDownloads.description: Enhanced DFM+ is a downloadable skill which increases the ease of initiating DFM, while making it more difficult to initiate ASM.   *This skill is also included in Skill Set 1. When purchasing a skill set, please check its contents. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 1. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 1.

childDownloads.title: F-117A "Stars and Stripes"
childDownloads.description: F-117A "Stars and Stripes" is an aircraft skin based on the USA national flag. Featuring an unforgettable design, it is guaranteed to leave a lasting impression on both allies and enemies alike.  *This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 4. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 4.

childDownloads.title: F-117A "THE IDOLM@STER" Skin Set
childDownloads.description: This set consists of two aircraft skins for the F-117A stealth attacker featuring Yukiho Hagiwara from the "THE IDOLM@STER" series. A standard color version and a black and white version of the same design are included in this set.  *This item can also be purchased in a pack. Please be careful not to purchase the same aircraft skins. This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 8. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 8.

childDownloads.title: F-14D "Halloween Pumpkin"
childDownloads.description: F-14D "Halloween Pumpkin" is an aircraft skin with a Halloween theme.  Don't underestimate the Jack-O'-Lantern! This F-14D is known for striking fear with its appearance during low speed battles.  *This item contains the same data featured in Compatibility Pack 2. After downloading this item, you do not have to download Compatibility Pack 2.
